plist.dict:
The Application ID<--> applicationId YOUR-APP-ID Indicates whether the SDK should present logs or not. Default value: true<--> logEnabled
Indicates whether the user privacy consent is required. Default value: false<--> privacyConsentRequired
Indicates whether location tracking should be enabled by default during SDK initialization. Default value: true<--> locationEnabledByDefault
Indicates whether the SDK is allowed to track the user's screen navigation. Default value: false<--> screenTrackingEnabled
Sets the devices that will run the SDK in development mode. Development devices send information about the SDK integration for troubleshooting in near real-time.<--> developmentDevices
